name: Financial Assistance to Victims of Domestic Violence, Dating Violence, Sexual Assault, and Stalking
objective: The objective of the program is to provide financial assistance to victims of domestic violence, dating violence, sexual assault, and stalking and evaluate the effectiveness of the funded projects.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support
rules_regulations: Program notices of funding opportunities can be found at https://www.justice.gov/ovw/open-notices-of-funding-opportunities. Recipients must comply with the current version of the DOJ Financial Grants Management Guide found at https://www.justice.gov/ovw/grant-management.

pons.pon: Improve Well-Being, Independence, and Financial Empowerment for Survivors of Domestic Violence
